text: <@U25PYL3Q8> thank you for the reply. Sorry if I was unclear. Yes, I have made a custom loop with JavaScript and have a working load more button. I was simply wondering if the "max posts per listing" editor setting was something that could be referenced with hubL in order to use that variable to decide how many posts to load at a time. Something like {{ theme_settings.max-posts-per-page }}.
